page.title: 07Hypermarket (cont)
page.content: (cont. from page 6) eight petrol pumps. Outside the main store is an enclosed{ {Garden Centre} and people can push their trolleys around easily because the doors are operated automatically like they do in the main building. Inside the main entrance is a{Cafe. There is also a{Travel Agency, a Shoe {Shop and a Newsagent's.} If you want to pay by cheque you have to get it certified before you go into the shopping area. There are twenty-seven checkout points where goods are put on a conveyor belt and the prices are recorded by a light beam. Also in the store is a {Building {Society, a hairdresser's,}and an{ {Estate Agency.}
